title: How does science conquer disease? - Quora

response.answer_text: Science is a field of information which depends on speculations and utilizations experimentation or observation to find out about the normal world. In connection to science overcoming infections, Biology, Chemistry, Anatomy, and Pharmacology are a portion of the fundamental territories of science which contemplates the human body. Individuals in the medication field consider these zones of science so as to think of essential measures to forestall or stop the advancement or spread of infections.
